properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.config.default-context
properties.description: The name of the default context

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.config.fail-fast
properties.description: Throw exceptions during config lookup if true, otherwise, log warnings.

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.config.profile-separator
properties.description: Separator for profile appended to the application name

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.config.root
properties.description: Root folder where the configuration for Zookeeper is kept

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.config.watcher.enabled
properties.description: Throw exceptions during config lookup if true, otherwise, log warnings.
